insurance-companies.name: Pumpkin
key-features: Voted “Best for Comprehensive Coverage” by Business Insider (2020)
90% reimbursement rate (not “UP TO 90%”)
10% multi-pet discount for each additional pet
Always a 14 day waiting period
No breed or upper age limits

insurance-companies.name: ManyPets
key-features: Get up to 100% back on vet bills, including exam fees
Affordable prices starting at $20/month for dogs, $15/month for cats
Optional wellness plan to save on routine and preventive care
Fast and paperless online claims process

insurance-companies.name: Spot
key-features: Free pet insurance quote in 30 seconds
Best-in-breed insurance coverage for accidents and illnesses
Exclusive training content from world-renowned trainers
Offers 24/7 veterinary helpline for emergencies and health questions
Flexible plans with up to 90% reimbursement on vet bills

insurance-companies.name: Prudent Pet
key-features: Rated the #1 pet insurance on Trustpilot
Unlimited 24/7 live vet chat
85% of claims reimbursed within 5 days

insurance-companies.name: Embrace
key-features: Get up to 90% back on bills using any vet
Industry's best diminishing deductible feature
30-day money-back guarantee
Policies start at less than $1/day

insurance-companies.name: Lemonade Pet
key-features: Coverage from America's favorite insurance company, starting at $10/month
Super fast claim reimbursement and everything else (powered by AI!)
Optional wellness package to help keep your pet healthy

insurance-companies.name: Healthy Paws
key-features: Over 570,000 pets insured
Over 1 million claims covered in the last year
A+ BBB - Accredited with 97 out of 100 rating

insurance-companies.name: ASPCA
key-features: Affordable plan options including accident-only and preventive care coverage
No risk with 30-day 100% money back guarantee
Visit any vet in the US (even specialists)

insurance-companies.name: Pawp
key-features: Covers 100 percent of any emergency up to $3,000
Protect up to 6 pets for only $24/month
Offers 24/7 instant video chatting with licensed vets

insurance-companies.name: Pets Best
key-features: No upper age limit on coverage
Direct-to-pay veterinarian option
Online claim submission

insurance-companies.name: Pet First
key-features: Covers any vet or animal hospital in the USA
No lifetime or per-incident limit
Partners with shelters and adoption agencies around the country
No age limits - pets ages 8 weeks and older can enroll

insurance-companies.name: Petplan
key-features: Provides coverage for veterinary exams related to illnesses and injuries
Claims often processed in 5 to 7 days
Pet owners can choose holistic and homeopathic treatment and have it covered
